noun.description: A substance that induces insensitivity to pain.
The study or practice of anesthesia.
examples: he trained as a medical technical officer, working in anesthetics

adjective.description: Inducing or relating to insensitivity to pain.

origin: Mid 19th century: from Greek anaisthētos insensible, related to anaisthēsia (see anesthesia), + -ic.
